title: The watch spot
description: A website for the wristwatch store. Adaptive design, a burger menu, animations, and a modal window for making a purchase online.

title: Bookshelf
description: A website for the bookshop with an adaptive design. A user has the possibility to sign up, sign in, and sign out of their account. All user shopping cart items are stored in the database.

title: Money Guard
responsibleFor: the overall composing of the project and routes, conducting code review, and providing assistance in developing all sections
description: An application designed to help users keep track of their financial transactions. It allows people to store information about their income and expenses.

title: Borshchahivka Spiders
skills: [React.js, Axios, Formik, Yup, i18next, Styled Components]
responsibleFor: Header, Hero, What we do, Partners, all forms and website translation
description: A website for Borshchahivka Spiders, a volunteer initiative weaving camouflage nets for the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

title: Your Pet
skills: [React.js, Axios, Formik, Yup, Styled Components, Date-fns]
description: A website for Your Pets. The user can register, find a pet or put his pet up for sale.
